dimensions:
without mount: 69 x 18 1/8 in. (175.3 x 46 cm)
with mount: 94 x 25 in. (238.8 x 63.5 cm)
title: Plum Blossoms
medium: hanging scroll, ink and colors on paper
inscriptions: Lengthy inscription, dated xin hai year (1911?), eight month.  An additional short inscription includes a dedication.  Signed twice and with four seals of the artist.
